title: Seducing Her Step
description: The morning after her very first time, 18-year old brat Macy is consumed by inappropriate daydreams about letting the man of the house take her without protection, and without pulling out. But when Macy discovers an inexperienced little princess living in the same household, she finds a naughty new way to make both of their forbidden fantasies come true . . . again, and again and again.  What happens behind their closed bedroom doors is simply too taboo to share here. Go ahead . . . it'll be our little secret.
author: Aria Cantrelle
